title: Ensure correct Editor-in-Chief labeling in editorial member UI

requirements.summary: Ensure any user-facing labels added/updated for the new Editor-in-Chief entry use correct English spelling and capitalization ("Editor-in-Chief").
acceptanceCriteria: All newly introduced user-facing text related to this change is in English and uses the label "Editor-in-Chief" (not "editor in cheaf").

file_operations.description: Update role badge rendering to prefer the canonical label "Editor-in-Chief" when member.isEditorInChief is true, ensuring correct spelling/capitalization even if the persisted role string differs.
Update editorial member list role display to prefer the canonical label "Editor-in-Chief" when member.isEditorInChief is true, ensuring consistent correct spelling/capitalization in the Admin Panel.
